title: MOOTS ROUTT RSL + GCN + SWISS GRAVEL EPIC
content:
Global Cycling Network (GCN) may have gotten our location wrong, but they say the next round of beers is on Ollie when we come visit them in the UK! Check out this amazing event held on gravel roads in Switzerland. If these videos don’t make you plan a Swiss getaway with your Moots then we are not sure what will. Two videos; one of the full event that covers 120miles (200km) and a whopping 19000 feet (6000 meters) of climbing over two days.  The ROUTT RSL is the perfect choice for this competitive event where speed, nimble handling and lightweight will all be needed to complete the course. Check out the videos below.

Swiss Gravel Epic full video:

You can dig a bit deeper into the ROUTT RSL HERE: ROUTT RSL

author: Jon Cariveau
